text: 1+1 International is an international TV channel aimed at the Ukrainian diaspora. It is owned by Igor Kolomoisky, one of Ukraine’s most powerful oligarchs. He was the governor of Dnipropetrovsk region in 2014. He was arrested on suspicion of embezzlement in 2023. He was sanctioned by the USA in 2021. 1+1 bought Zelenskyy’s hit comedy shows and heavily promoted his presidential campaign. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Television stations Category:2006 establishments in Europe Category:Companies of Ukraine
title: 1+1 International
